title: (x) Typeface French Connection 2010 / sans w/ round i dots, pointed w vertices & 2-storey a/g - Neutraface Text Demi {Mark S}
content:
Hi everyone,

I've been looking for the type used in the new french connection ad campaign,  
not quite sure which type is this though, any clue?

image here  
 [http://fashioneditoratlarge.blogspot.com/2010/02/posted-by-fashion-junio...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140929065055/http:/fashioneditoratlarge.blogspot.com/2010/02/posted-by-fashion-junior-at-large-how.html "http://fashioneditoratlarge.blogspot.com/2010/02/posted-by-fashion-junior-at-large-how.html")

Thanks
author: willwyatt

comments.content:
Some sort of Futura. But the t is different.  
Superla has a similar t, but not as tall.
More likely, the typeface is based on Erbar Sans...

<cite>More likely, the typeface is based on Erbar Sans</cite>

That would mean to customize, other than the t, the w too, and all ascenders.
